Item.sqlserver_body: CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX_access_propertyvalue_source_id] ON [innovator].[ACCESS_PROPERTYVALUE] ( [SOURCE_ID] ASC ) INCLUDE ( [CAN_CHANGE_ACCESS], [CAN_GET], [CAN_UPDATE], [RELATED_ID] ) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
Item.name: IX_access_propertyvalue_source_id
